pkgmetadata.longdescription: Fuzzy Measure Tools // Various tools for handling fuzzy measures, calculating Shapley value and interaction index, Choquet and Sugeno integrals, as well as fitting fuzzy measures to empirical data are provided. Construction of fuzzy measures from empirical data is done by solving a linear programming problem by using 'lpsolve' package, whose source in C adapted to the R environment is included. The description of the basic theory of fuzzy measures is in the manual in the Doc folder in this package.
